modName: Margaux Volaire Follower - CBBE and 7base by Gman749
descriptionHtml:
Watch the shadows! Margaux is a newly turned vampire who takes on special assignments for the Volkihar Clan. You can find her at the Vileymir Inn in Ivarstead, wearing Vampire Royal Armor

[img]https://i.imgur.com/k1pZxXE.jpg[/img]﻿
[img]https://i.imgur.com/82dYE3q.jpg[/img]

Note: I decided not to make Margaux an actual in-game vampire, as vampirism in Skyrim has some inconvenient drawbacks. She has the teeth, the eyes and a set of blood related abilities however, so hopefully that makes up for it :), also Dawngaurd and Dragonborn DLC is required for the armor and spells.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/AnVEYGb.jpg[/img]


Name: Margaux Volaire
Age: 22 (20 when turned)
Race: mixed Nord/Breton ancestry (Nord in Racemenu)
Height: 5'9
Weight: 139 lbs
Occupation: special agent for the Volkihar Clan

Background 

Margaux revels in being a vampire. Even before she located Volkihar Castle and Lord Harkon she was using her considerable family inheritance to buy powerful tomes and scrolls and delving deeper into the dark arts. losing her parents hurt her deeply and through dangerous and arcane rituals she sought a way to return them to life. Now an immortal being, she has an eternity to achieve this goal.


Thanks to all the excellent mod Authors of Skyrim Nexus, the incredible talent in the Image Gallery and especially,  my friends at the Art Fletcher Discord server who helped assist me with troubleshooting :) love you guys!
